name: omniverse-physx-sdk
description: The NVIDIA PhysX SDK is a scalable multi-platform physics solution supporting a wide range of devices, from smartphones to high-end multicore CPUs and GPUs. This is the latest NVIDIA official version of the PhysX engine which also directly integrates into Omniverse. This port differs from the other 'physx' port (pointing to a repo no longer officially supported by NVIDIA) in supported platforms. It guarantees support only for Omniverse supported platforms. This is NOT an NVIDIA officially supported port.
